trans-unit.source: Represents a menu that displays a set of related items or commands in a visually rich format that can be organized into multiple categorized subsets.
The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox> hosting a simple RibbonGallery.
![Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox-selection.png "Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open") Ribbon gallery in a combo box
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> class.
Gets the filter that returns all items in a ribbon gallery.

If you implement a custom <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.FilterItemTemplateSelector%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.FilterItemContainerStyleSelector%2A>, you can use this property to distinguish between "All" filter items and custom filter items.
The filter that returns all items in a ribbon gallery.
Gets or sets the style that is applied to items in the filter when the "All" filter is selected.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The style that is applied to items in the filter when the "All" filter is selected.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.AllFilterItemContainerStyle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is used to display items in the filter when the "All" filter is selected.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A template that specifies the visualization of the items.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.AllFilterItemTemplate*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this control can be added directly to the Quick Access Toolbar.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this control can be added directly to the Quick Access Toolbar; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.CanAddToQuickAccessToolBarDirectly*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a user can apply a filter to gallery items.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a filter can be applied to gallery items; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.CanUserFilter*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the style that is applied to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> element generated for each item.
If this property value is not `null`, it overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The style that is applied to the container element generated for each item.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.CategoryStyle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is used to display each item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref>.
If this property value is not `null`, it overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A template that specifies the visualization of the items.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.CategoryTemplate*> dependency property.
To be added.
Unloads the container for the specified item.
This method undoes the effects of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A> method.
The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Gets or sets a value that indicates that the gallery distributes all its available width equally between its columns.
The ColumnsStretchToFill property only has an effect when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.IsSharedColumnSizeScope%2A> is set to `true`.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the gallery distributes its available width equally between its columns; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ColumnsStretchToFill*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the command that is associated with this ribbon gallery.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The command that is associated with this ribbon gallery.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Gets or sets a user-defined data value to pass to the command.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A user-defined data value to pass to the command.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.CommandParameter*> dependency property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Command*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the element on which to invoke the specified command.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The element on which to invoke the command.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.CommandTarget*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets the command to invoke when the current gallery filter is changed by the user.
The command to invoke when the current filter is changed.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the style that is applied to the filter items container generated from a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> header.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The style applied to the filter items container element.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.FilterItemContainerStyle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the custom logic for selecting a <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> that is applied to items in the filter when a custom filter is selected.
You use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.FilterItemContainerStyle%2A> property to specify the appearance of the content.
If you have more than one style defined and want to specify logic that selects a style to use, then you use this property.
This property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.FilterItemContainerStyle%2A> property is set.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A custom <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StyleSelector"></xref> object that provides logic and returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.FilterItemContainerStyleSelector*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is used to display items in the filter when a custom filter is selected.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A template that specifies the visualization of the items.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.FilterItemTemplate*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the custom logic for selecting a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is used to display items in the filter when a custom filter is selected.
You use the<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.FilterItemTemplate%2A> property to specify the visualization of the content.
If you have more than one template defined and want to specify logic that selects a template to use, then you use this property.
This property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.FilterItemTemplate%2A> property is set.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A custom <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> object that provides logic and returns a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.FilterItemTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the style that is applied to the filter menu button.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The style that is applied to the filter menu button.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.FilterMenuButtonStyle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the contents of the filter pane.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The contents of the filter pane.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.FilterPaneContent*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is used to display the contents of the filter pane.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A template that specifies the visualization of the filter pane contents.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.FilterPaneContentTemplate*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the style that is applied to items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The style that is applied to items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.GalleryItemStyle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is used to display each item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A template that specifies the visualization of the items.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.GalleryItemTemplate*> dependency property.
To be added.
Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> object.

A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> container object that is used to display an item from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Gets the item that is currently highlighted.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The item that is currently highlighted.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.HighlightedItem*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets the value that indicates whether the gallery is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the gallery is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own container.
The item to test.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether this gallery defines the scope used for uniform layout of items.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this gallery defines the scope used for uniform layout of items; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.IsSharedColumnSizeScope*> dependency property.
To be added.

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the gallery should keep the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem*> synchronized with the current item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem*> is always synchronized with the current item in the source collection; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem*> is never synchronized with the current item; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem*> is synchronized with the current item only if the gallery is bound to a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource"></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of columns used to layout items in a gallery <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel*>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
The maximum number of columns used to layout items in a gallery <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel*>.
The registered default is <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.MaxColumnCount*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that specifies the minimum number of columns used to layout items in a gallery <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel*>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
The minimum number of columns used to layout items in a gallery <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel*>.The registered default is 1.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.MinColumnCount*> dependency property.
To be added.
Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> when a new template is applied.
This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
A new automation peer object for this control.
Updates the old and new items when the highlighted item changes.
Information about the change.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized"></xref> event.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged"></xref> event.
This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged> event data.
The event data.
Invoked when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> property changes.
Information about the change.
Invoked when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> property changes.
The old value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> property.
The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> property.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"></xref> event.
This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event data.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref> event.
This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event data.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewKeyDown"></xref> event.
The event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectionChanged"></xref> event.
This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem%2A> property changes.
The event data.
Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
This method prepares a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory> to display <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem> objects.
The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Gets or sets a user-defined data value to pass to the command when it is previewed.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A user-defined data value to pass to the command.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.PreviewCommandParameter*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a unique identifier that links a ribbon control to a corresponding control in the Quick Access Toolbar.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A unique identifier for a control in the Quick Access Toolbar.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.QuickAccessToolBarId*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Ribbon*> dependency property.
To be added.
Causes the object to scroll into view.
The object to bring into view.
Gets or sets the currently selected item in the ribbon gallery.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
The currently selected item, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no item is selected.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem*> dependency property.
To be added.

Gets or sets the value of the property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem*> that is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedValuePath*>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||

The value of the property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem*> that is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedValuePath*>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no item is selected.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Gets or sets the path that is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedValue*> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem*> in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The path that is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedValue*> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem*>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedValuePath*> dependency property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedValue*> dependency property.
To be added.
Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem*> property changes.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectionChanged"></xref> routed event.
To be added.
Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the control when the image size is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The image to display on the control.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SmallImageSource*> dependency property.
To be added.
Receives events from the centralized event manager.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> interface.
The type of the <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> calling this method.
The object that originated the event.
The event data.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the listener handled the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it receives an event that it does not recognize or handle.
Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the ToolTip for this control.
> [!WARNING] > Each ribbon control inherits a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set, the ribbons enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The descriptive text to display in the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
